mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Almira Lincoln Phelps to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1859 January 15
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Phelps, Lincoln, Mrs., 1793-1884
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Almira Lincoln Phelps to Ann Pamela Cunningham, January 15, 1859. Baltimore. Sends her gift of "Christian Households". Has rec'd some pamphlets inscribed "With compliments of the Southern Matron." Mrs. Phelps is sister of Emma Willard of Troy Seminary. Suggests she and her sister might edit a book on Mount Vernon, proceeds to go to MVLA.
